en.purpose: To assess the result of the body mass index of an individual.
en.use: Use for assessing the body mass index result of an individual
en.misuse: Do not use for calculating a BMI value.

gt0001.description:
Assessment of a BMI result. The frame of reference as defined by the World Health Organization (WHO):

* Below 18.5 - underweight
* 18.5 - 24.9 - normal weight
* 25.0 - 29.9 - pre-obesity
* 30.0 - 34.9 - obesity class I
* 35.0 - 39.9 - obesity class II
* Above 40.0 - obesity class III
